name: Lavatory Truck Offroad Parking
description:
Get ready for the off-road experience of your life with Lavatory truck Offroad Parking! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes offroad driving capabilities.

Park the Lavatory truck in the area marked with the Green outline. Don’t crash into anything! Aim for the fastest time with the least percentage damage! Once you damage it then the game is over.
